mapper.insert: insert into question(title, description, gmt_create, gmt_modified, creator, tag) values(#{title},#{description},#{gmtCreate},#{gmtModified},#{creator},#{tag})
mapper.select: select distinct q.id as qid, q.title, q.description, q.gmt_create, q.gmt_modified, q.creator, q.comment_count, q.view_count, q.like_count, q.tag, u.avatar_url, u.name, u.id as uid from question as q inner join user as u on q.creator=u.account_id where q.id=#{id} group by q.id
select count(1) from question where creator = #{accountId}
mapper.update: update question set title =#{title} , tag =#{tag} , description =#{description},gmt_modified =#{gmtModified} where id=#{id}
update question set view_count = view_count + 1 where id=#{id}
update question set comment_count = comment_count + 1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id,title ,description from question where tag REGEXP #{tags} and id != #{id};
select count(1) from question where creator =#{creator}
